mapper.select: select t.testdataid, patientid, userid, reservationid, testreceptionid, result, status, testdataname, testcontainer, testtype, groupcode, groupname, testunit, min, max from tests t, testsdatas td where t.testreceptionid = #{testreceptionid} AND t.testdataid = td.testdataid
mapper.insert:
insert into tests (testdataid, treatmentid, patientid, userid, reservationid, testreceptionid, result, status) values
(#{test.testdataid},#{test.treatmentid},#{test.patientid},#{test.userid},#{test.reservationid}, null, #{test.result},#{test.status})
